items.question: What is the structure of this file?
items.answer: This file is a JSON object containing an 'items' array. Each item represents a question card.

items.question: What fields are required?
items.answer: Each item must have a unique 'id', a 'question' string, and an 'answer' string.

items.question: Can I put HTML in the answer?
items.answer: Currently, the answer is displayed as plain text. It will wrap automatically to fit the card width.

items.question: How many questions can I add?
items.answer: You can add hundreds of questions. The application uses a masonry layout to organize them efficiently across columns.
